trans-unit.source: Provides a synchronization context for Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).
trans-unit.target: Fornece um contexto de sincronização para o WPF (Windows Presentation Foundation).

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is not specified at the creation of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext> instance, the current <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext>.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> não for especificado na criação do <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext> instância atual <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> está associado a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> class by using the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> usando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> to associate this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> with.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> a ser associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> class by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> usando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dispatcher" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dispatcher" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> to associate this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> with.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> a ser associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" />.

trans-unit.source: The priority used to send and post callback methods.
trans-unit.target: A prioridade usada para enviar e postar os métodos de retorno de chamada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> class by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> usando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia deste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" />.

trans-unit.source: The copy of this synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: A cópia deste contexto de sincronização.

trans-unit.source: The delegate to call.
trans-unit.target: O delegado a ser chamado.

trans-unit.source: The object passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O objeto passado ao delegado.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the callback in the synchronization context asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o retorno de chamada no contexto de sincronização de forma assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: The delegate is put in the dispatcher queue at a priority of <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal>.
trans-unit.target: O representante é colocado na fila do distribuidor em uma prioridade de <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext.Post%2A> starts an asynchronous request to post a message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext.Post%2A> inicia uma solicitação assíncrona para postar uma mensagem.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="d" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="d" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The delegate to call.
trans-unit.target: O delegado a ser chamado.

trans-unit.source: The object passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O objeto passado ao delegado.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the callback in the synchronization context synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o retorno de chamada no contexto de sincronização de forma síncrona.

trans-unit.source: The delegate is put in the dispatcher queue at a priority of <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal>.
trans-unit.target: O representante é colocado na fila do distribuidor em uma prioridade de <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="d" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="d" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the native operating system handles.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz que contém os identificadores do sistema operacional nativo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to wait for all handles; <see langword="false" /> to wait for any handle.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para aguardar todos os identificadores, <see langword="false" /> para aguardar qualquer identificador.

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> (-1) to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: O número de milissegundos para aguardar ou <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> (- 1) para aguardar indefinidamente.

trans-unit.source: Waits for any or all the elements in the specified array to receive a signal.
trans-unit.target: Aguarda até que um ou todos os elementos da matriz especificada recebam um sinal.

trans-unit.source: The array index of the object that satisfied the wait.
trans-unit.target: O índice da matriz do objeto que atendeu à espera.
